Uses of Package
gameMaster

  • Packages that use gameMaster 
    Package Description
    gameManager
    The next set of classes to be described is the Game Manager Classes, it isn’t as much of a set of classes but simply a singular class.
    gameMaster
    The Game Master is primarily responsible for keeping track of which player's turn it is, and determining win/loss game states once 3 or fewer units remain and a turn is ended.
    player
    The player sub system contains classes for Players and Robots, both of which have a single field which is their list of robots.
    units
    The units module is used to represent a “game piece” from the RoboSports board game.
  • Classes in gameMaster used by gameManager 
    Class and Description
    GameManagerObservor
    Interface created to have interactions between game manager and game master
    TeamColour
    Enumeration created for Team colour, It helps to get initial position, initial direction and images
  • Classes in gameMaster used by gameMaster 
    Class and Description
    GameManagerObservor
    Interface created to have interactions between game manager and game master
    TeamColour
    Enumeration created for Team colour, It helps to get initial position, initial direction and images
    TurnOrder
    Enumeration for turn order
  • Classes in gameMaster used by player 
    Class and Description
    TeamColour
    Enumeration created for Team colour, It helps to get initial position, initial direction and images
  • Classes in gameMaster used by units 
    Class and Description
    TeamColour
    Enumeration created for Team colour, It helps to get initial position, initial direction and images
